segment.source: How to Modify File-Mapping Information
segment.target: How to Modify File-Mapping Information

segment.source: How to Modify File-Mapping Information
segment.target: How to Modify File-Mapping Information

segment.source: How to Modify File-Mapping Information
segment.target: How to Modify File-Mapping Information

segment.source: After you sequence an application but before you save it, you can manually modify the virtual file system.
segment.target: After you sequence an application but before you save it, you can manually modify the virtual file system.

segment.source: Use the following procedures to add, delete, or edit a file in the virtual file system.
segment.target: Use the following procedures to add, delete, or edit a file in the virtual file system.

segment.source: To add a file in the file system
segment.target: To add a file in the file system

segment.source: Click the Virtual File System tab.
segment.target: Click the Virtual File System tab.

segment.source: Right-click a file under the virtual file system root in the left pane.
segment.target: Right-click a file under the virtual file system root in the left pane.

segment.source: On the menu, select Add.
segment.target: On the menu, select Add.

segment.source: Complete the following tasks in the New Virtual File System Mapping dialog box:
segment.target: Complete the following tasks in the New Virtual File System Mapping dialog box:

segment.source: To specify the new file association type the full network path to the new file.
segment.target: To specify the new file association type the full network path to the new file.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: To override the local directory, right-click the file you just added and, on the menu, select Override Local Directory; or to merge with the local directory, select Merge with Local Directory.
segment.target: To override the local directory, right-click the file you just added and, on the menu, select Override Local Directory; or to merge with the local directory, select Merge with Local Directory.

segment.source: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.
segment.target: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.

segment.source: To delete a file in the file system
segment.target: To delete a file in the file system

segment.source: Click the Virtual File System tab.
segment.target: Click the Virtual File System tab.

segment.source: Right-click a file in the virtual file system, and select Delete.
segment.target: Right-click a file in the virtual file system, and select Delete.

segment.source: Accept the confirmation message by clicking OK.
segment.target: Accept the confirmation message by clicking OK.

segment.source: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.
segment.target: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.

segment.source: To edit a file in the file system
segment.target: To edit a file in the file system

segment.source: Click the Virtual File System tab.
segment.target: Click the Virtual File System tab.

segment.source: Right-click a file in the virtual file system.
segment.target: Right-click a file in the virtual file system.

segment.source: On the menu, select Edit.
segment.target: On the menu, select Edit.

segment.source: Complete the following tasks in the Edit Virtual File System Mapping dialog box:
segment.target: Complete the following tasks in the Edit Virtual File System Mapping dialog box:

segment.source: To edit the file association, specify the full network path to the new file.
segment.target: To edit the file association, specify the full network path to the new file.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: To override the local directory, right-click the file you just edited and, on the menu, select Override Local Directory.
segment.target: To override the local directory, right-click the file you just edited and, on the menu, select Override Local Directory.

segment.source: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.
segment.target: On the File menu, select Save to save this change.
